## 1. Summary
The chat segment is brief and contains minimal technical discussion. Emotionull shared progress on a project called "Phetta kart" which now has movement functionality, though they mentioned the physics math implementation is "silly." They shared a link to phettaverse.games and noted that base "hyps" were created by doge, with other hyps being used to lead the cursor through it. Drdoge.eth suggested incorporating Eliza agents with different versions to cause mayhem. 0mka inquired about "hyperuber" and suggested that the "glitch circling" issue might be due to colliding colliders, which appears to be a technical observation about the physics implementation mentioned by emotionull.

## 2. FAQ
Q: When will hyperuber be available? (asked by 0mka) A: Unanswered
